item.title: Lujain add a quote by Kate Jacobs
item.description: "There's the life we dream, the life we deserve, and the life we get. I'll take what I got over what I deserve any day." -- Kate Jacobs

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Jane, be still; don't struggle so like a wild, frantic bird, that is rending its own plumage in its desperation." "I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being, with an independent will; which I now exert to leave you." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Kate Jacobs
item.description: "Life isn't a straightforward climb up the ladder. It can take a few slips to really gain perspective." -- Kate Jacobs

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Charlotte Bronte
item.description: "Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity or registering wrongs." -- Charlotte Bronte

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "If all the world hated you and believed you wicked, while your own conscience approved of you and absolved you from guilt, you would not be without friends." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them, and try to follow where they lead." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Amos Bronson Alcott
item.description: "Stay is a charming word in a friend's vocabulary." -- Amos Bronson Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "A faithful friend is a strong defense; And he that hath found him hath found a treasure." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Amos Bronson Alcott
item.description: "Good books, like good friends, are few and chosen; the more select, the more enjoyable." -- Amos Bronson Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "I ask not for any crown But that which all may win; Nor try to conquer any world Except the one within." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "That is a good book it seems to me, which is opened with expectation and closed with profit." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "I want to do something splendid… Something heroic or wonderful that won’t be forgotten after I’m dead… I think I shall write books." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "I've got the key to my castle in the air, but whether I can unlock the door remains to be seen." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Love is a great beautifier." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Life is like college; may I graduate and earn some honors." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Let us be elegant or die! --Amy" -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lujain add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have." -- J.K. Rowling
